title: Cybrpunk 2077 će biti na E3 2019
body:
Cybrpunk 2077 će biti na E3 2019

Ako ste kojim slučajem mislili da ćemo morati još dugo da čekamo dok ne dobijemo neke spektakularne informacije vezane za Cyberpunk 2077, bez brige jer je CD Projekt Red potvrdio da će igra biti predstavljena na E3 sajmu.

Cyberpunk 2077 će verovatno biti deo prezentacije neke od većih izdavača, kao što je prošle godine bio deo Majkrosoftove, a od novina očekujemo dosta zapravo, ali pre svega…

View On WordPress

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 Returns at E3 2019 After an explosive debut at last year’s E3 with a memorable trailer and nearly an hour of...
caption:
Cyberpunk 2077 Returns at E3 2019

After an explosive debut at last year’s E3 with a memorable trailer and nearly an hour of gameplay that eventually was shared with the general public, many have been wondering when CD Projekt Red’s upcoming RPG would be making its next appearance.

Check it!

https://www.hardcoregamer.com/2019/02/28/cyberpunk-2077-returns-at-e3-2019/326010/

blog.description: As said by my family, I'll probably die out of spite.

summary: CD Projekt Red replied to someone asking the release date for CP2077 and they said it was in the title. So, July 7th, 2020? or...
body:
CD Projekt Red replied to someone asking the release date for CP2077 and they said it was in the title.

So, July 7th, 2020? or July 7th 2019?

Or CD Projekt Red was just doing what they do and making their jokes. I find them fucking hilarious, by the way.

summary: When V is in her apartment in the demo gameplay, when she’s at the machine getting a drink, there’s an option of Joygirls or...
body: When V is in her apartment in the demo gameplay, when she’s at the machine getting a drink, there’s an option of Joygirls or Joyboys. That sounds like what that sounds like, but I don’t know what they are.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 Estará Presente En El E3 2019
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Estará Presente En El E3 2019
body:
Tal parece que este año veremos increíbles proyectos que están dispuestos a cambiar lo recurrente que pasa hoy en dia con los Battle Royale. Siendo estos los juegos más populares casi a nivel mundial. Sin embargo el dia de hoy la empresa CD Projekt nos reveló que tiene pensado hacer acto de presencia en el próximo E3 2019. Que se realizará el martes 11 de junio y culminará el jueves 13 de junio…

title: Cyberpunk 2077 estará en el E3 2019
body:
#Cyberpunk2077 estará en el E3 2019

Es lo nuevo de CD Projekt RED.

La cuenta oficial de Cyberpunk 2077 en Twitter ha respondido a las preguntas de sus seguidores confirmando que su esperado RPG en primera persona tendrá presencia en el E3 2019, que se celebra del 11 al 14 de junio.

https://twitter.com/CyberpunkGame/status/1101069253590032385

Cyberpunk 2077 es el nuevo videojuego de rol en primera persona con estructura…

View On WordPress

summary: Cyberpunk 2077: CD Projekt Red conferma la presenza all'E3
title: Cyberpunk 2077: CD Projekt Red conferma la presenza all'E3
body:
Cyberpunk 2077: CD Projekt Red conferma la presenza all’E3

Dopo che abbiamo potuto dare lo sbalorditivo primo sguardo su ciò che il nuovo progetto della CD Projekt RED, Cyberpunk 2077 durante l’E3 dello scorso anno, sembra giusto che lo studio si stia preparando per gli eventi del 2019.

L’account Twitter ufficiale del gioco ha deciso di rispondere alle domande su una possibile presenza E3 in un colpo solo, affrontando tutte le richieste con un tweet…

View On WordPress

tags: i think i just got another fic idea peeps!
summary:
Hey so I was thinking about Dum Dum about how the plot lines in Cyberpunk 2077 aren’t exactly linear sooo hear me out....
V goes...
body:
Hey so I was thinking about Dum Dum about how the plot lines in Cyberpunk 2077 aren’t exactly linear sooo hear me out….

V goes to that Maelstrom gang hideout to buy the spider bot, and it’s the first time that they go there right? Wellll what if you are able to do business with them beforehand? It would change the whole mission!

I’m just over here just trying to think of ways to get that sweet Dum Dum D!
